# meteostatr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

```{r}
library(terra)
library(meteostatr)

world <- vect("~/Documents/ne_10m_land.shp")
roi <- ext(9.5, 15, 41, 45)
roi <- crop(world, roi)
s <- stations(roi, show = TRUE)
d <- daily(unique(s$id)[1:3], "1990-01-01", "2010-12-31")
daily_coverage(d)
plot(d$date, d$tmax, col = as.factor(d$station))
```
